website_summaries.verdict: G-Shock watches are known for their toughness and build quality. Simple stainless steel and black design looks great.
pros: Customers like the stylish look of this watch
Includes water resistance down to 660 feet and shock resistance
Owners like the value they receive with this watch
cons: Some customers dislike the feel of the band
Watch's design may not be dressy enough

customer_reviews.title: Really nice watch/scratches very easily
customer_reviews.text: Really nice watch. Has some weight. Dial is eye-catching. Feels like “quality.” I was torn between this one and the $320 Bluetooth version. Didn’t need it and not interested in smart-watches. Amazons pic makes the steel look dull. This thing shines though so don’t be fooled. Was debating for a about a month... glad a went with this watch. Update: 6 days after purchase... scratched like crazy and can’t remember having bumped into ANYTHING... I’ve only worn three times.... not happy...
customer_reviews.author: michael moreno

customer_reviews.title: A super watch! Take it from a watch collector,
customer_reviews.text: I am a watch fanatic. I have a collection of mechanical watches from Vostoks to JLC and Rolexes. I dropped one of my more expensive watches at the security gate while taking it off and it messed up the watch completely. I had to spend 600 to service it. I was standing there and thinking WTF! An expensive respected watch should not be this unreliable. I decided to go for a G shock. This is my choice and boy what a great watch.
customer_reviews.author: Emadi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch, phenomenal price.
customer_reviews.text: This watch hits the mark. For the price on Amazon its nearly unbeatable. I just received my watch and it is everything I hoped for. Unlike some digital watches EVERYTHING is intuitive and fast. The LED lighting illuminates the dial perfectly without being to bright. And the watch easily allows you to choose a timezone quickly setting the time instantly, This process is also pleasant to watch as the hands automatically spin and reset. The build quality is out standing. This watch easily stands up to the quality of my 400 dollar Bulova. I am extremely impressed. Overall 1. Stylish 2. Superbly effective and useful 3. Tough, excellent build quality.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a Hublot Big Bang
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice watch for $170 (at the time of order) the LED backlight is a nice white light that illuminates the markers and hands. The lume is outstanding and the solar power reserve is amazing. Just wearing it one full day in the sun and the reserve has been set on 'high' for two weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: JVergara

customer_reviews.title: so I need to have a nice watch and this G-Shock is the perfect combination of ...
customer_reviews.text: Epic watch. Getting lots of compliments already. I work in sales, so I need to have a nice watch and this G-Shock is the perfect combination of style and functionality. I've got a small, 8 inch wrist, so I always get a silicone band, because metal bands don't adjust down enough to fit me. This one is perfect and the watch is extremely comfortable - even more comfortable than my other G-Shock. I will say it didn't ship on time, but all's well that ends well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: I probably should give this 5 stars because my dislike of this watch is more my fault than the ...
customer_reviews.text: I probably should give this 5 stars because my dislike of this watch is more my fault than the watches ... pay attention to the other reviews ... this is a really large watch. Unless you like an overly large watch on your arm or you have a really big arm this watch is tough to make work. I am 6'1' but have a slender build and it does not work. I love the watch but I will probably give it away to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned Casios for years. Reliable, long lived and generally nice looking timepieces. This particular watch seems exceptional. Great looking, excellent display, man-sized without being oversized, and fairly easy to adjust. Plus, it’s solar powered so battery issues are eliminated. I’ve only owned it about a week but I foresee no real problems and as a watch and an accessory, it’s really nice. A bit pricier than many other Casios but you get what you pay for. So far, I’ve been wearing it happily and have been complemented on it by several people since.
customer_reviews.author: Surfer Rick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set time, easy to read,  looks nice..
customer_reviews.text: Great watch and looks classy without killing the bank account. I own many g shocks and have for 30 years. This is my first analog dial gshock that I am going to keep. I like the operation of the mechanism over other analog dial gshocks I have gotten a hold of. Easy to set time unlike some others. Didnt even need to read the directions. Still learning the rest of the features and may update this review later as I do. Added a photo on my arm. I have bigger hands and it seems perfect to me in size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A well balanced piece of Art technology
customer_reviews.text: Elegant and sporty, conservative and casual, goes with any clothing... But the most outstanding besides the material combination (rubber, steel & glass) and the color, is: the "SYMMETRY"... What a combination of features to create a well balanced piece of art technology!... Well done!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joseluis Rodriguez A.

customer_reviews.title: Fancy G-Shock
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend absolutely loves this watch. Bought it for him for Christmas. It's definitely the more fancy side of G-Shock. The face is large, the technology is amazing, and the steel is beautiful. It arrived wonderfully packaged. I am 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Aarie

customer_reviews.title: Love the watch
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch. Face is big and easily readable. I also own a red Casio G-Shock with black dials and gray letters which is hard to read sometimes. No problem reading the dials on this watch. I also appreciate the solar battery power indicator which lets me know when I should shine some light on the watch. The band is smooth and comfortable. Very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: R. C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Casio Watch
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a number of G Shocks, usually in the $75-90r range, and always thought they were excellent values and reliable watches. Was looking for a functional next-gen version, with analog for the sweep hands and digital capability. This model did not disappoint. It looked better out of the box then it did on screen. The hands are easy to read--in any light--and the contrast of the backlit face, in dark settings, for readability, is superb. The band is comfortable and the watch has the rugged, durable feel, though not noticeably heavy. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Robert McFadden

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Watch Out of My Whole Collection
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I have about 25 watches. Couldn't settle on a daily one but this ticks all the boxes. Haven't look back. Sturdy, classy and sporty looking. No battery to change, strong glass, useful features and no fluff. Great looking. Felt it was a little big at first but now all my other watches seem small. Got used to it. Bezel might scratch easy but it's mostly unnoticeable and if it's a work watch that's gonna happen. I feel good using it in a freezer warehouse job or when trying to look spiffy.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Stunning quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bery strongly built, when not in sunlight, it turn off to conserve the life of the battery, as soon u get back into light all the time and date appears again. Im very happy with the purchase of this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. My One and only issue is that the hands aren't good for "at a glance" time telling, but then again... I can just switch to the digital if it's that serious, right!? Over all, it's a great, masculine watch. Might buy another. Got this one on sale for 188.00 saw in store for $220.00. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WATCH!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Gshock and I normally wear my Rolex but I wanted something that was solar powered and rugged because I kept bumping my Rolex into things. Well let me assure you this was a great buy!! Not heavy like other watches, very stylish and a abundance of features that a watch connoisseur would love! And s/o to the seller fr a big discount it was normally $300 on gshocks website but I got it with Amazon and the seller for $224!!! Go me!!! Thanks Amazon y'all continue to amaze!!! Love my G Shock steal!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking watch - Even better looking on and in person
customer_reviews.text: Great sports watch. I’ve heard these are used by Navy Seals and and are exactly as they advertise - Shock Proof - My husband loves his watch. Durable, sharp looking, doesn’t scratch and is fully waterproof. Bought on for my son in law and son and they all absolutely love love love this WATCH!
customer_reviews.author: RitaRic

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. It looks great and can take anything you throw at it. I wear mine paddle boarding and to the beach and I just run it under the sink when I get home.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: It was just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I made the right decision in choosing this watch as a gift for my husband. I was ver satisfied with the way it looked once I received it because it looks better than what it looks in the picture. It was just the perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Maria A

customer_reviews.title: What a beauty!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a watch that is waterproof/sports but classy for a long time. If this is what you are looking for this is the perfect. The attention to detail on the face is absolutely great. In all honesty this can even be pulled off as a dress watch. The huge face is also an showstopper. I have had many complements since I started to wear this. I have many watches as I am a watch lover and this one is really gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: drew

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Another great product by Casio. Fits great on the wrist and looks great. This is a watch that can be worn for almost every occasion. Only time will tell about the dependability. It should last for along time. Looks tough enough so I don't expect anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is awesome! Originally I was a bit skeptable because the watch measurements were big but since I have large wrists I figured I'd give it a try. I received it and it fits perfect. The bands are a perfect size also. I really like the feature where the light comes on after turning your wrist to view the time. This watch can be worn in both a causal and formal setting. All in all this is a 10.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: the best watch IHO
customer_reviews.text: i'm biased towards G-Shocks ... so it's unfair to take it from me ... this is the most awesomest watch built by mankind ... it's beautiful ... it's good looking ... it's gorgeous ... my wife is jealous now.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed K.

customer_reviews.title: Great cross between dressy and casual
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch, got it for my boyfriends birthday and he loves it. Great product G-shock. The solar power feature is much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Blanding

customer_reviews.title: Must have G-Shock
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved my G-Shock in the mail today. As usual Amazon delivers on time or before the estimated date of arrival. Now to the watch, which is absolutely amazing. seeing the watch in pictures does it no justice. The watch in person is in my opinion perfect. The face of the watch is big and bold and the silver face with the black band really makes the watch pop. Another cool thing about this watch is the light on the watch illuminates the entire inside of the watch making it easy to see the time, date and day of the week in the dark. G-Shock I give you major props for this watch you did an awesome job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This watch will not disappoint - price is appealing considering fit and finish of this watch
customer_reviews.text: Fit, finish and weight of watch is fantastic- features including LED back lighting, easy to navigate functions coupled with masculine aesthetics are all appealing and balanced features. I will be purchasing the black metal version of this watch....
customer_reviews.author: K. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Too Shiny
customer_reviews.text: Normally I like G-Shocks, but this watch is just too shiny. It looks like it's made for a girl or a woman. In the pics, the SS looks matte, but in person it's extremely shiny. Returned and went with (another) all-black version.
customer_reviews.author: MiamiMark

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, and probably would still be in my collection if not for the band. The fit of the band was adequate but the hard plastic seemed to really irritate the underside of my wrist. Its not just G Shocks- i've owned a handful- but this particular one was just not comfortable. If you like it, buy it, its a really good, reliable, nice looking watch- just dont be surprised if you have to swap the band out for comfort purposes, especially if you are at a keyboard most of the day.
customer_reviews.author: OTMarine

customer_reviews.title: Would Definitely Buy Again!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a dress watch as I have been a life-long Casio customer. It is great looking, rugged, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Arrived 2 days earlier than expected. Is big so if you are used to 42mm to 45mm then you wouldn't like it. Looks more expensive than what it is. Not to heavy on the wrist. Only con is the neobrite lime on the hands is too sensitive and turns bright green very easily. Light illuminates both face and digital area with a back light. Arrived with medium charge and 2 days exposed to direct sun from the window achieve a high charge and stay like that. Power save mode activates if the watch stay still and in a pitch dark area.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Miranda Grajales

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and tough...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Watch came in a great little box. I have had the watch now for a month and I love it. I have had many Casio watches in the past, and you cannot wear them out. I usually just stop wearing them and put them in a drawer to get another watch. This Casio is the best so far. Tough, good looking, and has a ton of functions.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is outstanding. The solar charging works very well. The hands have plenty of luminescence. It is easy to read and features the day of the week, the date and world time. It is a tough watch that can handle abuse. The watch is large but I like that since it doesn’t slide around on my wrist. For me the watch is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love the watch
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch. This is my 1st Casio and it looks great. Easy to set up and you can wear it with anything. It appears that this watch will stand the test of time. It is built solid !!! I would buy this watch again. Shipping was fast and the packaging was good.
customer_reviews.author: Bret R. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: One of Casio's finest!
customer_reviews.text: Of the 14 Casio watches I own this (so far) is my favorite. Set up (like all Casios) was a minor challenge but I prevailed. Try it - you'll like it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Schaub

customer_reviews.title: G-SHOCK on a whole new level
customer_reviews.text: Honestly until you see this watch in person you will not truly appreciate it's beauty because pictures don't do it justice it reminds me of of a Hublot and looks much more expensive than it is. I highly recommend this time piece for your collection!
customer_reviews.author: Rob and Didi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch. Been a fan of G-Shock for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing watch. Been a fan of G-Shock for a long time and glad they came out with a watch that is a little more fashionable than your standard G-Shock. The G-steel model is very similar to a higher end watch like the Audemars Piguet but at a much more manageable cost. While this watch is more fashionable, it retains its the durability and toughness of the G-Ghock.
customer_reviews.author: The Bells

customer_reviews.title: A great any occasion watch
customer_reviews.text: A very nice stylish watch for a gshock. Found same watch at a department store and it was less buying via Amazon. So far it's been working great. Battery came at mid level but after a couple days recharging with light it maintains at high level.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cat

customer_reviews.title: You will be powerful
customer_reviews.text: This watch is Awesome! Its a complete monster on your wrist and i feel like i receive Marvel type powers from its steel casing absorbing Zeus sun rays....
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Works and is tough.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is a very good option for me because I am so hard on the watches. I bang it, catch it on things and it is undamaged and keeps looking great. Keeps great time. Very easy to set and use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you want a shiny Man-Watch, look no further.
customer_reviews.text: All the pictures of this watch just do not do it justice. It's big, heavy and looks phenomenal in person. I will admit that from a distance it does look like a Hublot, but it has its own G-Shock uniqueness and flavor. It looks great with any attire from formal to shorts and flip flops. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: This thing looks great, and I love the solar aspect once you ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks great, and I love the solar aspect once you get it charged up nicely (there is a good LED charger for sale on Amazon). It's basically what I wanted, a more classy looking G Shock when I did not want to wear my cheaper military style G Shock. Have gotten a lot of compliments on it already, and while it looks big in the image, it works out great on your wrist.
customer_reviews.author: J. Whiddon

customer_reviews.title: The watch looks great but scratches easily as some other reviewers mention
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks great but scratches easily as some other reviewers mention. Casio should have provided this nice watch with better crystal.
customer_reviews.author: A. Osman

customer_reviews.title: Best Watch Ever !! ( IMO ).
customer_reviews.text: Best watch ever !! Great price too !! Still have to read that book that came along with the really nice packaging— but I got the basic info already down . Super fast delivery too !!
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy C Bop

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Looking Watch
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and very comfortable. I was surprised it didn't have a digital display for time on this watch and just the analog. When viewing another timezone you do have that digital display for time. Very happy with this purchase and consider this my dress watch.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Adena

customer_reviews.title: Authentic g-shock (Thailand)
customer_reviews.text: Was very satisfied with purchase. My only complaint is the watch is bulky and could get roughed up along the face edges. I knew the problems it could face and have no regrets with this item. If your planning to wear this watch daily then it could get bumps & bruises; then again what are g-shocks designed for?!? *also i have around a 7/7.5 wrist and i think it fits me well if this helps anyone
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Watch!
customer_reviews.text: Straight up the best dang watch I've owned in years! I've always liked G-Shocks as they give you a great bang for the buck and this is the best one yet. Great features, easy to use if you're used to G-shocks, looks awesome! This watch looks great going to the gym in workout clothes or with a blazer heading out on the town.
customer_reviews.author: aztriman

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you're a G-Shock fan
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! Needed something that was rugged and fancy at the same time. This watch fits the bill perfectly. I normally wear my other G-Shock that's all black and has been through hell and back with me (still works flawlessly btw). With this watch I have all the same basic functions and style to go with it. The arms are easy to read and when the light is activated it's just as easy to see at night. I've received so many compliments in the short time I've had it. Absolutely in love with this watch. It can also go scuba diving with me down to 200 feet if/when we go. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ReyS19

customer_reviews.title: easy. The finish quality is what you would expect ...
customer_reviews.text: My initial concerns about this watch was its size but it fits my 7 1/2" wrist perfectly with room to spare. Its larger face and hands makes reading time when it's dark, easy.The finish quality is what you would expect from a G - Shock; this, combined with the larger "industrious" style look, gives you a reliable yet stylish watch that doesn't need to have its batteries replaced - all pluses in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Pardue

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: this is great watch , great deal , i really loved it . would highly recommend it. unlike others this one is solar and charger on light , its always fully charged , if you go in the sun for 8 minutes or even less a day it will be always fully charger .
customer_reviews.author: mansour

customer_reviews.title: Worth paying more and love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because it is 1-2 minutes fast. It is still under warranty so I will follow up with repair experience. Other then that it looks great and is durable. I get compliments on it all the time. My wrist is small and the watch does not look too big at all. It is definitely worth the extra 80-100 over the kiddie models I originally sifted through. I am 40+ and can dress this up in addition to wearing it daily.
customer_reviews.author: OGSL

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT! I have several G-Shocks
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT! I have several G-Shocks, & this one is my new favorite. I get compliments all the time, & people asking me "What kind of watch is that?" They don't believe me when I tell them it's a G-Shock - until they see the logo. Same usual strong, reliable characteristics I've come to expect from the Casio G- Shock product line.
customer_reviews.author: Geno

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended, I do a lot of mechanics, it holds up well . The glass hasn't scratched yet. Had it for about four months.
customer_reviews.author: matt scott

customer_reviews.title: Was present. Like it
customer_reviews.text: This watch was presented as a gift 6 month ago. This person still wear it with pleasure. Works well and still looks like new. Worth the spend money
customer_reviews.author: Aleksey&Iryna

customer_reviews.title: Hello gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome watch, i love it,, its got a real presence and nice weight too. . It was gonna be my "everyday watch" for work (im a landscaper) but its too nice ! Will have to look for another one for that !
customer_reviews.author: Markus

customer_reviews.title: Best G-SHOCK!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is gorgeous, it has great design and is really functional, fashionable rugged look for a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Fepo

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after six months.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, but I should have read all the reviews. The analog time function stopped working after only six months. Customer service is basically non existent, so I'll just chalk it up to a $200 mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence R Marina,Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good looking for great price
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the watch and it fits my arm comfortably. I do think the leather strap model would be more comfortable as the resin band is quite hard. This is not a dealbreaker though and it is great to wear anyway.
customer_reviews.author: deon

customer_reviews.title: Very functional and a great watch to wear while traveling in different time zones
customer_reviews.text: A stunning looking watch. Got many compliments when wearing. Very functional and a great watch to wear while traveling in different time zones.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Ringel

customer_reviews.title: A Super addition to my G Shock line-up
customer_reviews.text: I like the style. I like the features, and I liked the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but after reading the reviews I decided to purchase the watch. It is exactly what I expected and more, super comfortable and extremely light. Perfect for f
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM BALETSA

customer_reviews.title: poor durability, but I love the watch.
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch itself. I have a few watches and wear this about once a week. Its now at Casio for its second out of warranty repair since I bought I new. Each repair is about $100. Next time it fails it goes in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: rcloff

customer_reviews.title: I dig this watch
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch. I have not had any of the scratching issues that are mentioned in some reviews. The watch looks great. And, it continues to work well after 6 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A mans watch !
customer_reviews.text: Great look and nice functionality ... just what I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart S.

customer_reviews.title: Casio GShock does it again
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the better G Shocks Casio has made in a few years. The steel part of the watch looks very sharp (and yes, is heavy). The band is comfortable , given the material. The lume is good, as is the light. Happy with the watch.
customer_reviews.author: W. Kimbrough

customer_reviews.title: Awesome technology
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this watch, the size, light, digital. I will buy it again
customer_reviews.author: The Crow 5.0

customer_reviews.title: a very big watch
customer_reviews.text: a classy looking manly watch. once I got it set up which took me a few minutes, I've worn it everyday since. I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN R EBERHARDT

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch indeed!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch. I've had the original G-Shock watch for the last 34 years! The size is decent, not too massive. The best part is the bezel, it is solid stainless steel, and when it gets a scratch, you can use a fine nail buffer and buff it back to it's original shine. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Big & Kind

customer_reviews.title: Great watch. Beeping buttons can be turned off
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Beeping buttons can be turned off. Eaisily readable dial. Takes about a week for the battery indicator to stay full. Well made, tough, best looking gshock that ive owned. My only complaint is that the stopwatch only goes up to an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Mando Commando

customer_reviews.title: Best G Shock on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I went into my local G Shock shop and tried on various watches some 8 times the price of this. It feels great on, substantial without feeling heavy or weighing you down. Beautiful time piece that looks as good with casual wear as formal. Very happy to own this. I would thoroughly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Damien Moore

customer_reviews.title: put it on and it looks just as nice as expected
customer_reviews.text: Just opened it, put it on and it looks just as nice as expected. I was afraid it was going to be too big because of my small wrists but It fits nicely. So far not disappointing, lets hope I don't have to update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Very gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas, it's more gorgeous than what the picture shows. Very nice watch
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ann Jones

customer_reviews.title: It performs all of the functions that my Breitling Aerospace ...
customer_reviews.text: It performs all of the functions that my Breitling Aerospace does and for about 5% of the cost of the Breiling. It is just a different look.
customer_reviews.author: Allan H. Gold

customer_reviews.title: A sexy watch
customer_reviews.text: I have owned alot of g shock watches and these are watches that last. This one is great quality and looks sexy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Holub

customer_reviews.title: Manly man watch
customer_reviews.text: Got this watch for my step dad who’s a police officer and he loves it! It’s a watch worn daily now, on and off duty.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia S

customer_reviews.title: Look good on a big guy like I am
customer_reviews.text: Spent a week in Hawaii. Had it always on me and in a salt water. Work with no issues. Look good on a big guy like I am. Just don't forget to soak them in the fresh water for 15 min after the ocean swim.
customer_reviews.author: Sergey I. Vakulchik

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks amazing with stainless steel and is very rugged highly recommend for active wear.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is nice looking. Seams to be a quality product. I can not get the battery indicator off low, and I have tried it all. But it works well so I dont worry about it. The band is nice, the watch is heavy but after wearing awhile you dont notice it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy & Steve

customer_reviews.title: Favorite watch!
customer_reviews.text: What a beast of a watch!!!! Rugged enough for the outdoors but stylish enough to wear with a suit.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: It’s a sharp looking watch!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very impressive watch. Nice size, very attractive, good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Stalzer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift for Husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this watch. The solar feature is his favorite. He says it's too nice to wear to work, And as a farmer It is pretty dressy but the function is amazing
customer_reviews.author: momo

customer_reviews.title: Classy Watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch was a week late to arrive. That's on Amazon. The watch itself is everything I hoped and more. It's classy and rugged. Great to wear in a mountain town for all occasions. Looks great. Fairly easy to set with instructions.
customer_reviews.author: VWAL

customer_reviews.title: G-Shock Does it Again!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Watch! I have a few watches including Samsung Gear S2 and like to switch up from time to time. But ever since purchasing this watch I cannot seem to leave it home. Its very comfortable, and goes well with formal or informal attire. Looks really expensive, and I have been getting compliments.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great Active Watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for wearing at the beach, the pool and other outdoor activities. It's great looking and has many cool functions. Most of all it is powered by the sun. Looking forward to having this watch for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Anderson

customer_reviews.title: G-shock
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very nice, but after about 2 months the time is not right about 2 minutes upfront, I’ve tried few cities and everywhere it shows 2 minutes upfront,and I can’t fix this
customer_reviews.author: robert nowik

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was about to buy a Tissot, but saw this Casio. I am very satisfied with the purchase. This is a heavy duty solar watch with the functions I use.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: It's his favorite watch now
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my husband for Father's Day and he flipped! The watch is gorgeous and masculine. It is also very lightweight regardless of appearance. Not as hard as I thought to set up. It's his favorite watch now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bridal party loved their gift very fashionable and great product
customer_reviews.author: Francesco A. Orfano

customer_reviews.title: Looks better in person!
customer_reviews.text: It’s GORGEOUS! Thank you! Delivered right to my front steps! I can’t wait to wear it out :)
customer_reviews.author: Ettezzil Renoclaf

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Best watch I’ve ever owned. Lasted 4 years working in construction
customer_reviews.author: Ralph matias

customer_reviews.title: I like this watch
customer_reviews.text: I like this watch, it has the functions i was looking for and i like the looks of the watch, that was a hard combination to find.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn W. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Style and price
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch it’s very stylish and price is excellent also easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Jose Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It looks fantastic, and very durable. If you want a tough watch this is for you. I would buy this watch again.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Robles

customer_reviews.title: The watch is super, exactly what we were expecting to get
customer_reviews.text: The watch is super, exactly what we were expecting to get. Its for my husband, he uses it more than week and everything works petfect!
customer_reviews.author: Vesi Towne

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a particular style of Hublot
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic looking watch. I have received a number of compliments on it. While it is a rather large watch it is not heavy or uncomfortable can pair well with even dress clothes. Excellent watch for the money
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Watch blacked-out after a year.
customer_reviews.text: Watch died after a little over a year. Now have to send it for repairs after paying $190 for this.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked as described. no issues. did return this one for the black one with tan strap
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this watch!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design! Like my previous G-SHOCK, it is very durable as well. I can't be happier with my purchase! Great value for my money!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Shock
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch only downside is it is pretty heavy and bulky at 51 mm. I think 48-49 mm would have been perfect
customer_reviews.author: Diego 949

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Sporty
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Sporty, but classy. The light up feature when you bring it to eye level is amazing. Perfect for times you can't use both hands at night.
customer_reviews.author: Amandof8

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch. Good weight, not too bulky. I wear it 10-12 hours a day in the food industry, not a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Casio Men's G Shock Stainless Steel Quartz Watch with Resin Strap, Black, 26.8 (Model: GST-S110-1ACR)
product_meta.description:
​

CasioWith the launch of its first watch in November 1974, Casio entered the wristwatch market at a time when the watch industry had just discovered digital technology. As a company with cutting-edge electronic technology developed for pocket calculators, Casio entered this field confident that it could develop timepieces that would lead the market.

Today, Casio is focusing its efforts on solar-powered radio-controlled watches: the built-in solar battery eliminates the nuisance of replacing batteries, atomic timekeeping means the users never have to reset the time. Recently, Casio launched a series of Bluetooth watches that sync to the users cell phone to automatically update the time. Casio is always moving time forward.



From G-SHOCK, the watch brand that is constantly setting new standards for timekeeping toughness, comes G-STEEL, a watch series with a new "layer guard structure". Different materials are used for the bezel to create a two-layer structure that adds a new dimension of shock resistant. For models that use stainless steel in the upper part, shock absorbing resin is employed in the lower part. If resin is used in the upper part, fine resin is used in the lower part to cushion against impact from the upper part. This also has made it possible create a wide range of different designs. The GST-S110 model expresses the hardness and beauty of metal. A hand shift feature temporarily moves hands out of the way with the press of a button for easy reading of digital display contents, while double LED face illumination keeps information easy to read at all times.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here. [PDF ] 
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :4.8 x 4.4 x 3.8 inches; 3.84 Ounces
 * Item model number :GST-S110-1ACR
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 Lithium Metal batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :September 9, 2015
 * Manufacturer :Casio
 * ASIN :B0155FJM6W

    *  #39680 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars428 ratings ​

feature_bullets: Tough solar powered, shock resistant, 200-meter water resistance, neobrite, double led light, world time, stopwatch, countdown timer, 5 daily alarms
Hourly time signal, hand shift feature, battery level indicator, power saving, full auto-calendar (to year 2099), 12/24-hour format, button operation tone on/off
Water resistant 200m (660ft): in general, suitable for professional marine activity and serious surface water sports, but not diving
